pullRequest.title: remove some warnings issued by checkstyle
pullRequest.bodyText:
What is it?

[✖] Bug fix (user facing)
[✖] Feature (user facing)
[✔] Code base improvement (dev facing)
[✖] Meta improvement to the project (dev facing)

Description of the changes in your PR
none
Fixes the following issue(s)
none
Relies on the following changes

drop unused methods
split blobs
make no final parameters
change file enconding (DataReader.java Mp4DashReader.java)

Testing apk
no needed
Agreement

[✔] I carefully read the contribution guidelines and agree to them.

commit.message:
checkstyle
* drop unused methods
* split blobs
* make no final parameters

nodes.bodyText:
@kapodamy I didn't recognize this before. Is that string written in the downloaded binaries?
If yes, we should remove that in a future PR for privacy reasons.
